item.title: Timeline graph for assignment term of Swiss Bundesraete
item.description: Timeline plot Should be: clean well sorted and arranged give the viewer the important information immediately Data is from the official portal of the Swiss government plot Here’s the R code: library(tidyverse) library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(scales) bundesraete <- read_delim("postdata/timeline-bundesraete/br.csv", delim = ";") %>% rowwise() %>% mutate(Wahl = dmy(Wahl), Rücktritt = min(dmy(Rücktritt), Sys.Date(), na.rm = T)) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate(Amtsdauer = paste(round((interval(Wahl, Rücktritt) / years(1)), digits = 1), "J.")) nr <- read_excel("postdata/timeline-bundesraete/nr.
